articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: ESO images a wondrous star factory to mark 60 years of collaboration - Phys.org
articles.description: For the past 60 years the European Southern Observatory (ESO) has been enabling scientists worldwide to discover the secrets of the universe. We mark this milestone by bringing you a spectacular new image of a star factory, the Cone Nebula, taken with ESO's V…
